text:
@realDonaldTrump @Varneyco 150,000 Americans dead. 

My state of South Carolina is suffering. McMaster mandated masks. A child died from covid-19 in the midlands. Hospitals filled. Government buildings closed. 

We need help, not pizza. 

Stop campaigning and start caring about Americans dying.
